item.title: 英国央行行长曼恩：美国从盟友处撤退可能损害美元地位
item.description: 英格兰银行（Bank of England）决策者凯瑟琳-曼（Catherine Mann）周三表示，美元作为全球储备货币的地位可能会因为该国减少对其朋友和军事盟友的支持而受到损害。【原文：The U.S. dollar's status as a global reserve currency could be undermined by the country's reduced support for its friends and military allies, Bank of England policymaker Catherine Mann said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：因担心美联储降息，债券投资者对哈希特可能担任美联储主席提出警告
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引几位熟悉谈话内容的人士的话报道称，债券投资者已向美国财政部表达了担忧，凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）可能会积极降息，以迎合唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的偏好。【原文：Bond investors have expressed concerns to the U.S. Treasury that Kevin Hassett could aggressively cut interest rates to align with President Donald Trump's preferences, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing several people familiar with the conversations.】

item.title: 亚马逊在 Prime Video 中添加新闻标签，推动用户扩展
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周三表示，将在其 Prime Video 流媒体服务上推出一个专门的新闻标签，所有美国用户将在今年年底前免费使用。【原文：Amazon.com said on Wednesday it is rolling out a dedicated news tab on its Prime Video streaming service, which will become available to all U.S. customers for free by the end of the year.】

item.title: 瑞穗的卡茨认为 "肥沃 "的环境将推动强劲的并购市场进入 2026 年
item.description: 瑞穗美洲投资与企业银行业务主管 Michal Katz 表示，随着首席执行官们寻求扩大规模，私募股权投资公司也在处理老化资产，推动 2025 年交易的 "肥沃 "条件将持续到今年年底和明年。【原文：The "fertile" conditions driving dealmaking in 2025 will persist through the end of the year and into the next as CEOs look for scale and private-equity firms offload aging assets, according to Michal Katz, Mizuho Americas head of investment and corporate banking.】

item.title: 金融科技公司 Marquis 在勒索软件泄露后通知受影响企业
item.description: 金融科技公司 Marquis 周二提交的一份文件显示，在 8 月份的一次勒索软件攻击中，黑客获取了包含客户数据的文件，因此该公司正在通知美国银行和信用社。【原文：Fintech firm Marquis is notifying U.S. banks and credit unions after an August ransomware attack allowed hackers to access files containing customer data, according to a company filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果公司设计主管艾伦-戴伊加盟 Meta
item.description: 苹果公司发言人周三证实，Meta Platforms 公司已经聘请了苹果公司长期负责用户界面设计的艾伦-戴伊（Alan Dye）。【原文：Meta Platforms has hired Alan Dye, Apple's longtime head of user interface design, a spokesperson for Apple confirmed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国会正在推动禁止立法者进行股票交易
item.description: 美国国会的一个两党联盟正在寻求采取行动，禁止立法者买卖个人股票，这种做法长期以来一直引发道德质疑，并在立法者之间激起内讧，争论如何深入监管他们的个人财务。【原文：A bipartisan coalition in the U.S. Congress is seeking action to ban lawmakers from buying and selling individual stocks, a practice that has long raised ethics questions and is stoking infighting among lawmakers over how deeply to regulate their personal finances.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普就出口管制问题会见了英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士告诉路透社，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周三会见了芯片巨头英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋，讨论出口管制问题。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump met with chip giant Nvidia's CEO Jensen Huang on Wednesday to discuss export controls, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 巴克莱高管称五大科技公司明年可能需要 1,000 亿美元融资
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）债务资本市场全球主管梅根-格拉珀（Meghan Graper）周三在路透社 NEXT 小组会议上表示，2026 年美国五大科技公司的资金需求可能达到近 1000 亿美元。【原文：The funding needs of the top five U.S. technology firms could reach almost $100 billion in 2026, Meghan Graper, global head of debt capital markets at Barclays, said on Wednesday at a Reuters NEXT panel.】

item.title: 任命纳尔逊后，汇丰的长期愿景受到质疑
item.description: 汇丰银行任命布伦丹-尼尔森（Brendan Nelson）长期担任董事长，引发了企业治理专家和分析师对这家专注于亚洲市场的银行的继任规划和长期愿景的质疑。【原文：HSBC's appointment of Brendan Nelson as chairman on a permanent basis raises questions about the Asia-focused bank's succession planning and long-term vision, corporate governance experts and analysts said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 首席技术官 Subramanian 表示，Citadel 首次推出面向股票投资者的新人工智能工具
item.description: 亿万富翁肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）创立的对冲基金 Citadel 公司首席技术官周三表示，该公司已推出一款新的人工智能工具，旨在帮助投资者更快、更高效地进行股票研究。【原文：Citadel, the hedge fund founded by billionaire Ken Griffin, has launched a new artificial intelligence-powered tool that aims to help investors conduct research on stocks faster and more efficiently, the firm's chief technology officer said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Glencore 将重启阿根廷 Alumbrera 铜矿的生产
item.description: 嘉能可公司（Glencore）周三表示，计划在明年年底前重启阿根廷Alumbrera铜矿的运营，该铜矿在2018年关闭之前是阿根廷最后一个生产红色金属的铜矿。【原文：Glencore plans to restart operations at its Alumbrera copper mine in Argentina by the end of next year, it said on Wednesday, after it became the last to produce the red metal in the country before shuttering the site in 2018.】

item.title: 嘉信理财首席执行官称将关注更多并购交易
item.description: 嘉信理财首席执行官里克-沃斯特（Rick Wurster）周三表示，公司将寻求更多的收购，并有信心做好公司的整合工作。【原文：Charles Schwab CEO Rick Wurster said on Wednesday the firm will look for more acquisitions and is confident it can integrate companies well.】

item.title: Codelco 与 Glencore 就智利冶炼厂项目签署协议
item.description: 智利国营铜生产商 Codelco (COBRE.UL) 周三表示，该公司已与瑞士贸易商嘉能可 (Glencore) 签署了一份谅解备忘录，双方将在智利合作开发一个冶炼厂项目。【原文：Chile's state-run copper producer Codelco (COBRE.UL) said on Wednesday it has signed a memorandum of understanding to collaborate on a smelter project in Chile with Swiss trader Glencore .】

item.title: 英伟达（Nvidia）服务器将中国月兔人工智能公司（Moonshoot AI）和其他公司的人工智能模型速度提高了十倍
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周三公布的最新数据显示，其最新的人工智能服务器可将新机型（包括两款来自中国的热门机型）的性能提高 10 倍。【原文：Nvidia on Wednesday published new data showing that its latest artificial intelligence server can improve the performance of new models - including two popular ones from China - by 10 times.】

item.title: 与欧洲汽车制造商达成协议后，Aeva 股价大涨
item.description: Aeva Technologies 是一家总部位于硅谷的激光雷达设备制造商，其产品可帮助自动驾驶汽车感知周围环境，该公司宣布与一家欧洲乘用车制造商达成独家供货协议后，其股价在周三午盘交易中上涨超过 18%。【原文：Shares of Aeva Technologies , a Silicon Valley-based maker of lidar units that help autonomous vehicles sense their surroundings, rose more than 18% in midday trading on Wednesday after the company announced an exclusive deal to supply a European maker of passenger vehicles.】

item.title: 零售商使出浑身解数抵消通胀和关税拖累
item.description: 零售商们正在尝试各种策略来抵御通货膨胀和关税带来的拖累，从倚重富裕顾客和名人广告到直接关闭商店，不一而足。【原文：Retailers are trying various strategies to counter the drag from inflation and tariffs, from leaning on wealthier customers and celebrity ads to outright store closures.】

item.title: 媒体大亨莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）表示，特朗普与哥伦比亚广播公司的诉讼和解是 "正确的决定
item.description: 媒体大亨莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）周三表示，派拉蒙公司同意支付 1600 万美元，以解决美国总统唐纳德-特朗普就《60 分钟》采访提起的诉讼，这是一个 "正确的决定"。【原文：Media Mogul Shari Redstone said on Wednesday Paramount made the "right decision" by agreeing to pay $16 million to settle a lawsuit filed by U.S. President Donald Trump over a "60 Minutes" interview.】

item.title: 路透社 Next 会议上金融和市场发言人的精彩发言
item.description: 路透社将于周三和周四在纽约举办为期两天的 "路透 Next "会议，700 多位国际商界领袖和政策制定者将齐聚一堂，共同探讨社会、商业和世界面临的最大问题。【原文：Reuters is hosting the two-day Reuters Next conference in New York on Wednesday and Thursday, bringing together more than 700 international business leaders and policymakers to examine the biggest issues facing society, business and the world.】

item.title: Blackstone 首席技术官称数据泄露让他彻夜难眠
item.description: 黑石集团首席技术官周三在纽约举行的路透 NEXT 会议上表示，黑石集团越来越关注数据泄露问题，以及哪些平台可以帮助管理数据安全。【原文：Blackstone's Chief Technology Officer is increasingly concerned about data leaks and which platforms can help manage safety, he told the Reuters NEXT conference in New York on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，波音公司必须剥离 Spirit AeroSystems 公司资产才能继续并购
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会周三表示，将要求波音公司剥离 Spirit AeroSystems 公司的大量资产，以解决波音公司斥资 83 亿美元收购这家航空供应商所引发的竞争问题。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission said on Wednesday it would require Boeing to divest significant Spirit AeroSystems assets to resolve competition concerns around its $8.3 billion acquisition of the airline supplier.】

item.title: 特朗普提议大幅削减美国汽车燃油经济性规定
item.description: 特朗普政府 周三将提议大幅削减 的燃油经济性标准。 的燃油经济性标准。 特朗普政府将于周三提议大幅削减前总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）去年敲定的燃油经济性标准、 汽车制造商和消息人士告诉路透社。【原文：The Trump administration on Wednesday will propose a significant rollback of fuel economy standards finalized by former President Joe Biden last year in its latest push to make it easier for automakers to sell gas-powered cars, automakers and sources told Reuters.】

item.title: 财政部顾问称，利率下调很可能会消除对 50 年期抵押贷款的需求
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的顾问约瑟夫-拉沃格纳（Joseph Lavorgna）周三告诉路透社 NEXT，降低利率可能会消除唐纳德-特朗普总统政府为提高住房负担能力而推出的 50 年期抵押贷款的必要性。【原文：Lower interest rates would likely eliminate the need for a 50-year mortgage floated by President Donald Trump's administration to boost housing affordability, Joseph Lavorgna, a counselor to U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, told Reuters NEXT on Wednesday.】

item.title: 对冲基金在动荡的 11 月表现如何
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，截至 11 月底，包括选股基金在内的全球对冲基金在 2025 年的回报率接近 15%，超过了几家大型多策略对冲基金。【原文：Global hedge funds, including stock pickers, have generated returns of nearly 15% in 2025 to the end of November, according to a Goldman Sachs report, edging out several large multi-strategy hedge funds.】

item.title: 全球供应短缺，美光将退出消费类内存业务
item.description: 存储芯片制造商美光科技（Micron Technology）周三表示，将退出消费类业务，同时在全球重要半导体供应短缺的情况下，加倍努力开发人工智能数据中心使用的先进存储芯片。【原文：Memory chipmaker Micron Technology said on Wednesday it will exit its consumer business, as it doubles down on advanced memory chips used in artificial intelligence data centers amid a global supply shortage of the essential semiconductors.】

item.title: 俄罗斯禁止访问美国儿童游戏平台 Roblox
item.description: 俄罗斯指责该游戏平台传播极端主义材料和 "女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋和变性者宣传"。【原文：Russia accused the gaming platform of distributing extremist materials and "LGBT propaganda."】

item.title: 公民银行认为消费者的财务和支出具有弹性
item.description: 美国公民金融集团（Citizens Financial Group）总裁布兰登-考富林（Brendan Coughlin）周三表示，尽管有迹象表明信用评分较低的借款人面临压力，但美国消费者的财务状况大体保持健康。【原文：U.S. consumer finances remain broadly healthy, even though there are some signs of stress for borrowers with lower credit scores, Brendan Coughlin, president of Citizens Financial Group, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 洛克希德-马丁公司启用新的高超音速武器设施
item.description: 洛克希德-马丁公司（Lockheed Martin）周三表示，该公司已在其亨茨维尔（Huntsville）园区开设了一个高超音速系统集成实验室，以推动下一代武器的开发。【原文：Lockheed Martin said on Wednesday it has opened a hypersonics system integration lab at its Huntsville campus as it pushes to develop next-generation weapons.】

item.title: 贝森特认为 "特朗普账户 "将获得更多私人捐款
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，他预计会有更多的亿万富翁、基金会和公司向新的 "特朗普账户 "捐款，这些账户将用于资助在 2025 年至 2028 年间出生的 2500 万美国人。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said he expects more billionaires, foundations and corporations to contribute funds to the new "Trump accounts" for 25 million Americans born between 2025 and 2028, which he said will help them participate in asset appreciation now associated with wealthier families.】

item.title: 贝森特计划推动美联储银行行长地区居住要求
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周三表示，他计划倡导一项要求，即 12 家地区联邦储备银行行长在被任命为其银行领导之前，应在其所在地区居住至少三年。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Wednesday said he plans to advocate for a requirement that the 12 regional Federal Reserve Bank presidents should reside in their districts for at least three years before being appointed to lead their banks.】
